attributes.action: make England, Northern Ireland, Scotland and Wales independant.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: make the four countries of the uk independant so that we can scrap the titles of uk and british and the union jack flag. we should all be proud of the country we live in i.e in england we are english, in scotland they are scottish, in wales they are welsh and in ireland they are irish. we are not recognised on application forms because we can choose british or uk but not our actual country.
